text: @IvankaTrump Bad enough we have to pay for you to break quarantine to hang at yer pop’s resort. Now we’re supposed to aplaude your saccharine platitudes about shadow puppet? It’s 2020 gurrrl. Trump response to coronavirus is worse than 1918, but the rest of us have Netflix.
